√ślāgh 'extol'

present: [1.] ślā́ghate etc.  ślā́ghati  

perfect: śaślāghire  

[aorist: aśaślāghat  aślāghiṣṭa  ślāghiṣyate  ślāghitā  ]

verbal: ślāghita  

secondary: passive: ślāghyate etc. E.+   -- causative: ślāghayati etc. E.+  

derivatives: ślāghā B.+  ślāghin E.+  ślāghya E.+  ślāghana E.+  ślāghanīya E.+  ślāghiṣṭha B.
